contact.exit_criteria: Meeting scheduled or no response after 3 attempts

gaming_brand.subject: Partnership Opportunity - [YOUR_CHANNEL] x [BRAND_NAME]
gaming_brand.template:
Hi [CONTACT_NAME],

I've been following [BRAND_NAME]'s incredible work in the gaming space, particularly [SPECIFIC_INTEREST].

I run [CHANNEL_NAME], a gaming-focused channel with [SUBSCRIBER_COUNT] engaged subscribers who are passionate about [RELEVANT_TOPICS]. Our audience demographics align perfectly with [BRAND_NAME]'s target market.

I believe there's a strong opportunity for collaboration that could benefit both our audiences. Some initial ideas:
â€¢ Authentic product reviews and demonstrations
â€¢ Integrated sponsorship segments
â€¢ Social media cross-promotion
â€¢ Custom content series featuring [BRAND_NAME] products

Our recent sponsorship with [SIMILAR_BRAND] generated [IMPRESSIVE_METRIC], and I'm confident we could achieve similar or better results together.

Would you be open to a brief 15-minute call next week to explore how we might work together?

Best regards,
[YOUR_NAME]

streaming_platform.subject: Streaming Tools Partnership - Growing Together
streaming_platform.template:
Hi [CONTACT_NAME],

As an active streamer with [MONTHLY_VIEWERS] monthly viewers, I've been searching for the perfect [TOOL_CATEGORY] solution, and [PLATFORM_NAME] stands out.

I stream [STREAM_FREQUENCY] and my community frequently asks about my streaming setup. I'd love to explore a partnership where I can:
â€¢ Showcase [PLATFORM_NAME] features during streams
â€¢ Create tutorial content for new streamers
â€¢ Provide feedback from an active creator's perspective
â€¢ Offer exclusive discounts to my community

I'm particularly interested in [SPECIFIC_FEATURE] and how it could enhance my content.

Could we schedule a quick call to discuss a mutually beneficial partnership?

Looking forward to connecting!
[YOUR_NAME]

no_response.subject: Re: Partnership Opportunity - Quick Follow-up
no_response.template:
Hi [CONTACT_NAME],

I wanted to follow up on my previous email about a potential partnership between [BRAND_NAME] and [YOUR_CHANNEL].

I understand you're likely busy, so I'll keep this brief. Since my last email:
â€¢ We've grown to [NEW_SUBSCRIBER_COUNT] subscribers
â€¢ Our recent [CONTENT_TYPE] video hit [VIEW_COUNT] views
â€¢ Several viewers specifically asked about [BRAND_PRODUCT]

If partnership discussions aren't a priority right now, I completely understand. Would it be helpful if I reached out again in [TIMEFRAME]?

Thanks for your time!
[YOUR_NAME]

post_meeting.subject: Great connecting! Next steps for [BRAND_NAME] partnership
post_meeting.template:
Hi [CONTACT_NAME],

Thank you for taking the time to meet today! I'm excited about the potential partnership between [BRAND_NAME] and [YOUR_CHANNEL].

As discussed, here's what I'll do next:
â€¢ [ACTION_ITEM_1]
â€¢ [ACTION_ITEM_2]
â€¢ [ACTION_ITEM_3]

And from your side:
â€¢ [THEIR_ACTION_1]
â€¢ [THEIR_ACTION_2]

I'll have the [DELIVERABLE] ready by [DATE]. In the meantime, feel free to reach out with any questions.

Looking forward to working together!
[YOUR_NAME]

comprehensive.subject: [YOUR_CHANNEL] x [BRAND_NAME] Partnership Proposal
comprehensive.template:
Hi [CONTACT_NAME],

Following our conversation, I'm pleased to present a comprehensive partnership proposal for [BRAND_NAME] and [YOUR_CHANNEL].

ðŸŽ¯ PROPOSED DELIVERABLES

key_clauses.exclusivity: During the Term, Creator agrees not to promote direct competitors of Sponsor in the [CATEGORY] space
key_clauses.content_approval: Sponsor shall have 48 hours to review and approve content before publication
key_clauses.usage_rights: Sponsor receives perpetual, worldwide license to use created content for marketing purposes
key_clauses.payment_terms: Net 30 payment terms upon completion of monthly deliverables
key_clauses.termination: Either party may terminate with 30 days written notice

commission_structures.flat_rate: X% commission on all referred sales

tracking_requirements: Include FTC disclosure on all content

value_propositions: Proven track record with similar brands

common_objections.budget_concerns: Let's explore performance-based compensation or a smaller pilot program to prove ROI
common_objections.audience_size: Our engagement rate of X% significantly outperforms industry average, meaning better conversion
common_objections.content_control: We can establish clear brand guidelines while maintaining authentic voice that resonates with audience
common_objections.exclusivity_demands: We can offer category exclusivity rather than complete exclusivity to maintain diverse revenue streams
